function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on online crowdsourced mapping","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and communication between data producers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of affordable provision of water and safe sanitation in settlements","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Breakdown of support structures for vulnerable groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of predefined protocols for vulnerability in epidemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mismanagement of deceased individuals leading to tension and resistance among local populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fatigue and wariness in local populations due to lack of engagement by external agencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear and reliable information about the disease and control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to provide specific guidance and protective equipment for essential workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate alternatives for mass religious gatherings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of physical distancing and isolation strategies in congested areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance and unrest due to externally imposed restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community-led development practices may facilitate spread of covid-19 due to in-person contact with high-risk groups.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation and rumors spread through radio and social media may foster confusion, distrust, or panic within the community.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective settlement-wide quarantines during the ebola outbreak led to violence and were ultimately abandoned.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stigma associated with contracting covid-19 and social distancing messages exacerbating social marginalization.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"States of emergency and ’emergency thinking’ may preclude locally led and adapted responses, hindering effectiveness and harm reduction.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Precarious position of migrant workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Breakdown in social protection due to school closures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of virus exposure for people with disabilities due to reliance on others and limited ability to self-isolate.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in accessing services and information for displaced people living in informal settlements.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Gender-specific impacts, including increased caring burdens for women and girls, uneven earning potential, and higher exposure risk for female health workers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heightened social tensions and security risks in informal settlements, including criminal activity and strained socioeconomic conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Short and long-term mental health challenges for people with mental health problems and frontline responders.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insecurity and threats of eviction for tenants in informal settlements, exacerbated by the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accelerated spread of virus due to population fleeing or traveling under the radar","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to food due to movement restrictions and closure of markets and food vendors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Systemic vulnerabilities in informal settlements including health, social, natural, and infrastructural issues","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited livelihoods and savings may lead to economic vulnerability and inability to access vital resources like water.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Haphazard health seeking behavior in severe disease cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of inadequate or inappropriate care at hospitals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of seeking care due to messaging about no cure for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People working through illness due to need to make a living","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited ventilation increasing transmission risk","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate access to water and handwashing facilities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of undetected and poorly managed chronic conditions in communities, increasing the risk of large numbers of people being at risk.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence on social and environmental transmission dynamics, leading to uncertainty in understanding and mitigating transmission vulnerability.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population and housing density in informal settlements leading to increased opportunities for social mixing and limited options for physical distancing.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High prevalence of chronic conditions in informal settlements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly documented disease burdens and reliance on informal healthcare providers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental factors increasing the risk of respiratory diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data on informal settlements and the novelty of the disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Epidemiological vulnerability to covid-19, especially for those over 70 years of age and with underlying health conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential gender differences in infection rates, with men being almost twice as likely to die as women","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Informal settlements with inadequate infrastructure and services","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of secure tenure for residents","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mistrust in government messaging and control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restrictive control measures may not be sustainable","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Swift action needed before widespread transmission in lmic cities takes hold","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Organizational challenges of epidemic control require meaningful local involvement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
